    • Method Detail

      • setPathFinder

        public void setPathFinder(PathFinder pathFinder)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
        Sets the current pathFinder on this ResourceManager. The pathFinder may be useful, even if resources are not managed on the file system. For instance the URI of the capabilityList that defines the current set of resources can be found with PathFinder.getCapabilityListUri(). A ResourceManager should rely on the fact that each call to this method signifies the synchronisation of a new set of resources.
        Specified by:
        setPathFinder in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        pathFinder - the pathFinder for the current set of resources

      • keepOnly

        public boolean keepOnly(@Nonnull
                        Set<URI> normalizedURIs)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
        Clean up the managed store. Only resources that are identified by the given normalizedURIs should be kept in the managed store, others should be removed or deleted. This call enables the ResourceManager to clean up if the Source issues a new ResourceList. The ResourceManager should only remove resources that are not listed. The ResourceManager will be enabled to ResourceManager.create(URI) and/or ResourceManager.update(URI) resources that are indicated in the set but are not yet in the managed store.
        Specified by:
        keepOnly in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        normalizedURIs - identify the resources that should be kept in the managed store.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

      • keep

        public boolean keep(@Nonnull
                    URI normalizedURI)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
        Keep the resource that is identified by the given normalizedURI. The resource is present and verified to be up-to-date. So the ResourceManager is not expected to handle the indicated resource, but may, of course, take any action it deems appropriate.
        Specified by:
        keep in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:
        normalizedURI - identifies the resource
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

      • create

        public boolean create(@Nonnull

        Create the resource that is identified by the given normalizedURI. The resource was not present.
        Specified by:

      • update

        public boolean update(@Nonnull
                      URI normalizedURI)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
        Update the resource that is identified by the given normalizedURI. The resource was present but was not up-to-date.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

      • delete

        public boolean delete(@Nonnull
                      URI normalizedURI)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
        Delete or remove the resource that is identified by the given normalizedURI. The resource was present but was purged from the set of resources.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface ResourceManager
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
